DrugName: Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitor (SSRI) such as Fluoxetine or Sertraline
Benzodiazepine like Alprazolam for anxiety management
Carbidopa-Levodopa to manage Parkinsonism symptoms, with a dose adjustment of 1.5 TAB PO ASDIR considering her current q2 schedule is overdue
Ropinirole or Pramipexole as an alternative to Carbidopa-Levodopa if needed
Cognitive enhancers like donepezil to address cognitive decline and memory issues
Buspirone for agoraphobia and panic disorder management
